CREATE TABLE d_mm${localChannelId} ( id integer NOT NULL, message_id bigint NOT NULL REFERENCES d_m${localChannelId}(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, date_created timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, status character(1) NOT NULL, connector_map text, channel_map text, response_map text, errors text, send_attempts integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, CONSTRAINT mm${localChannelId}_pkey PRIMARY KEY(id, message_id) );
CREATE INDEX d_mm${localChannelId}_index1 ON d_mm${localChannelId} USING BTREE (message_id); CREATE INDEX d_mm${localChannelId}_index2 ON d_mm${localChannelId} USING BTREE (id, status);

CREATE TABLE d_ms${localChannelId} ( metadata_id integer, received bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, received_total bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, filtered bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, filtered_total bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, transformed bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, transformed_total bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, pending bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, pending_total bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, sent bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, sent_total bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, queued bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, queued_total bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, error bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, error_total bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 );
CREATE SEQUENCE d_msq${localChannelId} INCREMENT 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 START 1 CACHE 1

CREATE TABLE d_channels ( local_channel_id bigint NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, channel_id character varying(36) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT unique_channel_id UNIQUE (channel_id) )

CREATE TABLE d_events ( event_id bigserial NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, event_type integer NOT NULL, channel_id character varying(36) NOT NULL, metadata_id integer, message_id bigint, message_status character(1), event_date timestamp NOT NULL )
